org.apache.archiva.repository.content.maven2

Class MavenRepositoryRequestInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.repository.content.maven2.MavenRepositoryRequestInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryRequestInfo

    public class MavenRepositoryRequestInfo
extends Object
implements RepositoryRequestInfo
    RepositoryRequest is used to determine the type of request that is incoming, and convert it to an appropriate ArtifactReference.

    • Method Detail

      • toArtifactReference

        public ArtifactReference toArtifactReference(String requestedPath)
                                      throws LayoutException
        Takes an incoming requested path (in "/" format) and gleans the layout and ArtifactReference appropriate for that content.
        Specified by:
        toArtifactReference in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath - the relative path to the content.
        Returns:
        the ArtifactReference for the requestedPath.
        Throws:
        LayoutException - if the request path is not layout valid.

      • isMetadata

        public boolean isMetadata(String requestedPath)

        Tests the path to see if it conforms to the expectations of a metadata request.

        NOTE: This does a cursory check on the path's last element. A result of true from this method is not a guarantee that the metadata is in a valid format, or that it even contains data.

        Specified by:
        isMetadata in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath - the path to test.
        Returns:
        true if the requestedPath is likely a metadata request.

      • isArchetypeCatalog

        public boolean isArchetypeCatalog(String requestedPath)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryRequestInfo
        Returns true, if the given request points to a archetype catalog.
        Specified by:
        isArchetypeCatalog in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath -
        Returns:
        true if the requestedPath is likely an archetype catalog request.

      • isSupportFile

        public boolean isSupportFile(String requestedPath)

        Tests the path to see if it conforms to the expectations of a support file request.

        Tests for .sha1, .md5, .asc, and .php.

        NOTE: This does a cursory check on the path's extension only. A result of true from this method is not a guarantee that the support resource is in a valid format, or that it even contains data.

        Specified by:
        isSupportFile in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath - the path to test.
        Returns:
        true if the requestedPath is likely that of a support file request.

      • isMetadataSupportFile

        public boolean isMetadataSupportFile(String requestedPath)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryRequestInfo

        Tests the path to see if it conforms to the expectations of a support file request of the metadata file.

        May test for certain extensions like .sha1, .md5, .asc, and .php.

        NOTE: The implementation may do only a cursory check on the path's extension. A result of true from this method is not a guarantee that the support resource is in a valid format, or that it even contains data.

        Specified by:
        isMetadataSupportFile in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath - the path to test.
        Returns:
        true if the requestedPath is likely that of a support file request.

      • getLayout

        public String getLayout(String requestPath)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryRequestInfo
        Returns the likely layout type for the given request. Implementations may only check the path elements for this. To make sure, the path is valid, you should call RepositoryRequestInfo.toArtifactReference(String)
        Specified by:
        getLayout in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Returns:

      • toNativePath

        public String toNativePath(String requestedPath)
                    throws LayoutException
        Adjust the requestedPath to conform to the native layout of the provided ManagedRepositoryContent.
        Specified by:
        toNativePath in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Parameters:
        requestedPath - the incoming requested path.
        Returns:
        the adjusted (to native) path.
        Throws:
        LayoutException - if the path cannot be parsed.

        public <T extends RepositoryFeature<T>> RepositoryFeature<T> getFeature(Class<T> clazz)
                                                                 throws UnsupportedFeatureException
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryRequestInfo
        Extension method that allows to provide different features that are not supported by all repository types.
        Specified by:
        getFeature in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Type Parameters:
        T - This is the class of the feature
        Parameters:
        clazz - The feature class that is requested
        Returns:
        The feature implementation for this repository instance, if it is supported
        Throws:
        UnsupportedFeatureException - if the feature is not supported by this repository type

      • supportsFeature

        public <T extends RepositoryFeature<T>> boolean supportsFeature(Class<T> clazz)
        Description copied from interface: RepositoryRequestInfo
        Returns true, if the requested feature is supported by this repository.
        Specified by:
        supportsFeature in interface RepositoryRequestInfo
        Type Parameters:
        T - The requested feature class
        Parameters:
        clazz - The requested feature class
        Returns:
